item.title: MOPAC 7
item.dc:creator: linux4chemistry
item.description: MOPAC is a general-purpose semi-empirical molecular orbital package for the study of chemical structures and reactions. The semi-empirical Hamiltonians MNDO, MINDO/3, AM1, and PM3 are used in the electronic part of the calculation to obtain molecular orbitals, the heat of formation and its derivative with resperivative with respect to molecular geometry.

item.title: SCHAKAL
item.dc:creator: linux4chemistry
item.description: SCHAKAL is a FORTRAN program for the graphical representation of molecular and solid-state models.
